meanings.definition: A person who supervises the production of a show, movie, or other entertainment.
meanings.sent1: The directors made sure the actors knew their lines.
meanings.sent2: The directors of the film were very talented.
meanings.sent3: The directors decided to have a surprise ending to the play.
meanings.sent4: The directors orchestrated a masterpiece on stage.
meanings.sent5: The directors' vision brought the story to life on screen.

meanings.definition: A person who controls or manages an organization or company.
meanings.sent1: The directors of the company held a meeting to discuss profits.
meanings.sent2: The directors are responsible for making important decisions.
meanings.sent3: The directors joked about having a company-wide pajama day.
meanings.sent4: The directors steered the company through rough waters.
meanings.sent5: The directors' leadership guided the company to success.
